GetAllTasks.query:
query GetAllTasks($lastFetchedTaskId: Int, $categorySlug: String, $includeExpired: Boolean, $includeArchived: Boolean, $onlyUnavailable: Boolean, $taskType: String) {
      tasks(
        lastFetchedTaskId: $lastFetchedTaskId
        categorySlug: $categorySlug
        includeExpired: $includeExpired
        includeArchived: $includeArchived
        onlyUnavailable: $onlyUnavailable
        taskType: $taskType
      ) {
        ...ContestCardFields
        archivedAt
        __typename
  }
}

fragment ContestCardFields on Task {
      ...TaskCardFields
      totalSubmissionsCount
      numberOfWinners
      FeaturedSubmissionUsers {
        id
        address
        avatarCid
        __typename
  }
  __typename
}

fragment TaskCardFields on Task {
      id
      title
      taskType
      missionDoc
      namespace
      rewardType
      rewardAmount
      rewardTokenId
      completedAt
      rewardToken {
        ...TokenFields
        __typename
  }
  expirationDate
  createdAt
  externalUrl
  totalBountyClaimersCount
  status
  Category {
        id
        name
        slug
        emoji
        __typename
  }
  Dao {
        ...DaoLogoFields
        bgColor
        namespace
        __typename
  }
  __typename
}

fragment TokenFields on Token {
      id
      address
      name
      symbol
      decimals
      chainId
      updatedAt
      usdPrice
      __typename
}

fragment DaoLogoFields on Dao {
      name
      logoCid
      __typename
}

GetTaskFromSlug.query:
query GetTaskFromSlug($slug: String!) {
  task(slug: $slug) {
    ...TaskPageFields
    __typename
  }
}

fragment TaskPageFields on Task {
  id
  title
  taskType
  namespace
  isClosed
  rewardType
  rewardAmount
  rewardToken {
    ...TokenFields
    __typename
  }
  rewardNft {
    name
    chainId
    address
    tokenId
    previewImageCid
    previewVideoCid
    __typename
  }
  createdAt
  expirationDate
  completedAt
  archivedAt
  xp
  rewardTokenId
  numberOfWinners
  missionDoc
  instructionsDoc
  submissionType
  totalSubmissionsCount
  totalBountyClaimersCount
  bountyClaimedByUser
  userCanManage
  Winners {
    ...UserAvatarFields
    __typename
  }
  UserSubmission {
    ...SubmissionCardFields
    __typename
  }
  Category {
    id
    name
    slug
    emoji
    __typename
  }
  Dao {
    ...DaoLogoFields
    id
    namespace
    coverCid
    ogImageCid
    __typename
  }
  BountySteps {
    ...BountyStepFields
    __typename
  }
  ogImageCid
  __typename
}

fragment TokenFields on Token {
  id
  address
  name
  symbol
  decimals
  chainId
  updatedAt
  usdPrice
  __typename
}

fragment UserAvatarFields on User {
  id
  username
  address
  avatarCid
  __typename
}

fragment SubmissionCardFields on Submission {
  id
  content
  didWin
  createdAt
  User {
    ...UserAvatarFields
    __typename
  }
  Task {
    id
    submissionType
    namespace
    __typename
  }
  __typename
}

fragment DaoLogoFields on Dao {
  name
  logoCid
  __typename
}

fragment BountyStepFields on BountyStep {
  id
  bountyActionKey
  isFulfilled
  data
  orderIndex
  title
  description
  actionLink
  __typename
}
